catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Miscellany
author: Maimonides, Moses
description: Contents: (Not by) Saʿadia ben Joseph, Sidur Rasag (ff. 2r-7v). Sefer Yetsirah (ff. 8r-19v). Naḥmanides, Derashot ha-Ramban (Sermons by Naḥmanides) (ff. 20r-32r). Moses Maimonides, Perush ha-Mishnah le-Rambam (Pereḳ ḥeleḳ) (ff. 34r-38r). ʿOlam ḳaṭan (ff. 39r-41r). Moses of Narbonne, Igeret ʿal shiʿur ḳomah (ff. 42r-46v). Seder tanaʾim (ff. 47r-49v).
